content: That's really helpful, thanks! I've been using a planner to write down my to-do lists and allocate specific tasks to specific times of the day, and it's really helped me stay focused and avoid procrastination. One thing I've been struggling with is finding time to meal prep on Sundays, as I've been leaving work later than usual and it's affecting my dinner routine. Do you have any suggestions on how I can adjust my Sunday routine to fit in meal prep?
